overview: Rainer Burmeister (director) tells a story about everyday working life of 46 young Mozambican people in the GDR who were employed as contract workers. Among them is 20-year-old Luisa, who worked in the mining industry and, like the others, is now training to be a craftswoman.

production_companies.name: Hochschule für Film und Fernsehen der DDR

title: Good Luck – Pictures of an Encounter
